p: Finally, the limonoid 5α,6β,8α,12α-tetrahydro-28-norisotoonafolin from the Australian tree Toona ciliata (Meliaceae) is an interesting allelochemical. Its phytotoxicity was tested by Nebo et al. [ 100], which showed its inhibitory effect on the seed germination and seedling growth of four standard target species with higher bioactivity levels than the commercial herbicide Logran.
